member.name: M:EasyPermissionManagement.Web.Controllers.IdentifierPermissionController.ApplyPermissionAsync(EasyPermissionManagement.Web.Dtos.DefinePermissionRequestDto)
member.param: Define Permission Request Data Transfer Object

member.name: M:EasyPermissionManagement.Web.Controllers.IdentifierPermissionController.AuthorizeCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Authorize Check For User Identifier Endpoint
member.remarks: The authorization status of the id information coming over the route will be determined by the User Identifier method. This endpoint will check lead.read permission with User Identifier method.

member.name: M:EasyPermissionManagement.Web.Controllers.IdentifierPermissionController.FailAuthorizeCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Fail Authorize Check For User Identifier Endpoint The authorization status of the id information coming over the route will be determined by the User Identifier method. This endpoint will check lead.read permission with User Identifier method.
